profile.name: Uciel
profile.title: Frontend Engineer
profile.description:
My name is Uciel Sola, and I'm a driven Frontend Developer based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. With a passion for solving problems and a strong foundation in user experience principles, I craft intuitive digital experiences. My expertise includes TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and frameworks like Svelte, React, Vue, and Angular.

At [Viset](https://www.visetlab.com/en), I enhanced the user experience of a mobile app with 200+ daily users, focusing on intuitive navigation and seamless interactions. Additionally, I streamlined internal processes by developing custom admin panels for efficient user and content management.

For [Mercanis](https://mercanis.com), I built client-tailored software solutions, prioritizing user-friendly interfaces for improved adoption and efficiency. I collaborated with product designers to define and implement new features based on user feedback, and actively participated in expanding our development team through technical interviews.

I'm adaptable, collaborative, and eager to continue growing as a developer with the goal of becoming an exceptional Frontend Team Leader.

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJe_RIAuftNpQRKgxwKOnE2zs)

interestingFacts.fact:
Here you can listen to my Tango Ensemble latest album (I made this website with SvelteKit)
https://sud.ucielsola.com

challenges.description:
I've been working at Mercanis since May 2022 and it has been a great experience so far. The team is fantastic and it's definitely a great place to work. During my time here, my main responsibilities have been related to developing software that meets our clients' needs.

In addition, I've had the opportunity to work on designing new features and developing their implementations. This has allowed me to apply my technical skills to solve problems and add value to the company. Being involved in the product development process has given me a greater understanding of our product and how we can continue to improve it.

Another way I've contributed to the company is by participating in technical interviews to help identify talented candidates for our team. It's been rewarding to see the impact of my contributions in ensuring that we have a strong team and maintain high standards of quality.

I've been working at Viset since October 2021, and as the sole frontend developer for our mobile app, I have taken on a significant responsibility in maintaining and improving the user experience. Despite being the only frontend developer, I have been able to ensure that our app runs smoothly and provides a great experience for our users.

Our app has a solid base of over 200 daily users, and it's been exciting to see its growth and success. In addition to my frontend work, I've also developed solutions for internal use, such as admin panels for user and content management. These solutions have helped to streamline our internal processes and improve the efficiency of our team.

Overall, my experience at Viset has been rewarding, and I take pride in the work that I've done to help our app and team succeed.

details.name: SUD Tango - Music Player
details.description: Music player built with SvelteKit, using WEBAudio API.

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription: I like challenges, and I don't care if they are a little about my actual possibilities if I now that I have a good team to fallback into when I need it.
manfredSpecificData.goodPractices:
As a frontend engineer, I believe that maintaining clean and well-organized code is crucial for the success of any project. Therefore, I make it a priority to write code that is easy to read and understand, both for myself and for my team members.

Another important practice that I follow is staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends. This helps me to identify opportunities for improvement and to incorporate new tools and techniques into my workflow.

In addition, I believe in the value of collaboration and effective communication. I strive to work closely with my team members and stakeholders, actively seeking feedback and offering suggestions for improvement. This helps to ensure that everyone is on the same page and that the project is moving forward in a cohesive and efficient manner.

Another key practice that I follow is testing and debugging my code thoroughly. This helps to catch any errors or issues early on in the development process, allowing for faster and more efficient resolution.

Finally, I believe in maintaining a positive and proactive attitude, even in the face of challenges or setbacks. By staying motivated and committed to the project, I am able to overcome obstacles and deliver high-quality work that meets the needs of my team and stakeholders.
